Hammer Throw.name: Hammer Throw
Hammer Throw.flavor: You hurl your hammer. It bashes one foe and spins through the air to knock another to the ground before returning to your hand.
Hammer Throw.requirement: You must be wielding a hammer.
Hammer Throw.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn. Make a secondary attack.
Hammer Throw.secondaryTarget: One creature within 3 squares of the primary target
Hammer Throw.secondaryOnHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the secondary target prone.
Hammer Throw.special: When you use this power, you can make the attacks as if your hammer was a heavy thrown weapon. The hammer returns to your hand after the attacks are resolved.

Stalwart Defense.name: Stalwart Defense
Stalwart Defense.flavor: Moradin’s power shields you from the onslaught of your foes.
Stalwart Defense.effect: Until the stance ends, you gain resist 5 to all damage and a +2 bonus to Fortitude.

Quake Strike.name: Quake Strike
Quake Strike.flavor: You slam your hammer to the ground, unleashing an earthquake that represents Moradin’s wrath.
Quake Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a hammer.
Quake Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier thunder damage, and you knock the target prone.
Quake Strike.effect: The burst creates a zone of difficult terrain that lasts until the end of the encounter.
